message: message I vote ANC. It is my choice. Much as you vote for a party of your choice. if only they had better lies TK which party would you recommend as a viable alternative to the ANC? All parties become corrupt when in power. We should rather have a system where we vote for individuals instead of parties. Why don't we get rid of the party political system??? coming in on the blind. it is not the voting but it is a case of educating the masses so that they can make the right choices molweni corruption is not a case of education except maybe Zuma but it's a case of morals.
